snippet: Housing financing reform should use the mortgage companies, not destroy them for something completely untested.
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column criticizes Pres Obama for capitulating to conservatives who wish to phase out Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac in favor of housing finance market that is primarily driven by private capital; warns despite past mistakes, it would be foolish to dissolve two entities that are profitable and succeeding at their core mission--guaranteeing and securitizing mortgages.
lead_paragraph: Housing financing reform should use the mortgage companies, not destroy them for something completely untested.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
